comments.author: RomeVacationTips
comments.body:
Let's not have multiple threads on the same annoyance, which has been around for years. 

Please refer to [this thread](https://www.reddit.com/r/rome/comments/1hk2cu6/what_is_this_scam/) for further discussion.

comments.author: infiniti30
comments.body: Also if someone tries to toss you something or put anything around your neck/wrist ignore them.
